column5: Im looking at a Northstar Explorer 435 fish finder.  Anyone used this unit or know anything about this brand.  Seems like a good unit but I have never heard of them.
Google the product, looks to have been around for about 37 years, under the Navico Co name,
I would stick with Humminbird or Lowrance/Eagle. That way you know who is going to service it or supply parts.
